summary: Vampire eyes based on Dawnguard Dovahkiin wallpaper.
descriptionHtml:
This is my take on the Dawnguard vampire eyes.


Install Instructions
=====================
Unzip contents into your data file, click yes to overwrite.


Requirements
=============
Skyrim
Dawnguard


Recommended Mods
================
If you are like me and just wanted the cool eyes and pale skin when
becoming a vampire and don\'t want your face textures or structure to change, 
I recommend using these two mods together:

Normal Dawnguard Vampire Faces (by jm220)  	Link:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21921
Vampire Face Less Sunken Cheeks (by devacore) 	Link:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16506

or If you use Enhanced character edit (by tktk1)   Link:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951
you need: No Vampire Sunken Face for Enhanced Character Edit Females AND Vanilla Males
	  (by azarathkahn) Link:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22477
author: Acolyte598
